title: Xor Filters: Faster and Smaller Than Bloom and Cuckoo Filters: ACM Journal of Experimental Algorithmics: Vol 25, No null
excerpt: The Bloom filter provides fast approximate set membership while using little memory. Engineers often use these filters to avoid slow operations such as disk or network accesses. As an alternative, a cuckoo filter may need less space than a Bloom filter ...
